chapter.text: As you make your way to the theater you hear rattling coming from the windows,^500 you turn to see a large silhouette of what you can only hope is another person.^1500 As the thought enters your mind that you might be able to get some help,^500 you watch as a large bandaged hand bursts through the window.^1500 The hand feels around for any type of lock,^500 but isn’t able to open the window.^1500 The figure takes it’s hand away and walks,^500 searching for another way in.
